simoutput

simoutput.Rd

Output results for the simulation for different icc methods under various conditions to investigate the sample size and number of raters requirements for ICC and SEM calculations.

simoutput

Format

A data frame with 2280 rows and 22 variables:

n

condition parameter: sample size

cor

condition parameter: raw correlation between raters

k

condition parameter: number of raters

variance

condition parameter: variance between patients

deviation

condition parameter: k raters with systematic deviation

method

condition parameter: icc method

set

condition parameter: simultion iteration (averaged)

icc

output parameter: average icc

lower

output parameter: average lower bound of CI for icc

upper

output parameter: average upper bound of CI for icc

sem

output parameter: average sem

varpat

output parameter: variance between patients

varobs

output parameter: variance between raters

varerr

output parameter: residual variance

Ticc

empirical population parameter: icc

Tsem

empirical population parameter: sem

bias_icc

result parameter: average bias for icc

bias_sem

result parameter: average bias for sem

mse_icc

result parameter: mean squared error for icc

mse_sem

result parameter: mean squared error for sem

cov_icc

result parameter: coverage of CI for icc

width_icc

result parameter: width of CI for icc

width_sem

result parameter: width of CI for sem

Source

data-raw/R/simoutput.R
